final_result:
bubblesort([], Acc, Acc).
bubblesort([X], Acc, [X|Acc]).
bubblesort([X, Y | Rest], Acc, Sorted) :-
    if_then_else(
        X > Y,
        bubblesort([X | Rest], [Y | Acc], Sorted),
        bubblesort([Y | Rest], [X | Acc], Sorted)
    ).
forth_sort(L,L2) :- bubblesort(L,[],L2).
query(forth_sort([3,1,2,5,7,12],X)).
